aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon's Commercial Agreements and Business Relationships
Amazon provides physical retail services to businesses through commercial agreements.
Amazon provides e-commerce services to businesses through commercial agreements.
Amazon provides omnichannel retail services to businesses through commercial agreements.
Amazon provides cloud services to businesses through commercial agreements.
Amazon provides web services to businesses through commercial agreements.
Amazon provides technology services to businesses through commercial agreements.
Amazon provides fulfillment services to businesses through commercial agreements.
Amazon provides computing services to businesses through commercial agreements.
Amazon provides digital storage services to businesses through commercial agreements.
Amazon enables sellers to offer products through Amazon's stores.
Amazon enables sellers to offer services through Amazon's stores.
Commercial agreements, strategic alliances, and business relationships expose Amazon to risks.
Amazon's arrangements with businesses are complex.
Amazon's arrangements require substantial infrastructure capacity.
Amazon's arrangements require personnel commitments.
Amazon's arrangements require other resource commitments.
Resource commitments may limit the amount of business Amazon can service.
Amazon may not be able to implement components of commercial relationships.
Amazon may not be able to maintain components of commercial relationships.
Amazon may not be able to develop components of commercial relationships.
Components of commercial relationships include web services.
Components of commercial relationships include fulfillment.
Components of commercial relationships include customer service.
Components of commercial relationships include inventory management.
Components of commercial relationships include tax collection.
Components of commercial relationships include payment processing.
Components of commercial relationships include hardware.
Components of commercial relationships include content.
Components of commercial relationships include third-party software.
Components of commercial relationships include engaging third parties to perform services.

complement.value: engaging third parties to perform services

text:
##### Our Commercial Agreements, Strategic Alliances, and Other Business Relationships Expose Us to Risks

We provide physical, e-commerce, and omnichannel retail, cloud services, and other services to businesses through commercial agreements, strategic alliances, and business relationships. Under these agreements, we provide web services, technology, fulfillment, computing, digital storage, and other services, as well as enable sellers to offer products or services through our stores. These arrangements are complex and require substantial infrastructure capacity, personnel, and other resource commitments, which may limit the amount of business we can service. We may not be able to implement, maintain, and develop the components of these commercial relationships, which may include web services, fulfillment, customer service, inventory management, tax collection, payment processing, hardware, content, and third-party software, and engaging third parties to perform services.
